Package atariCore

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AIEngine
    Main AI-Mode Manager.
    AtariKeyListener
    An extended interface to handle keyboard fast input.
    FileManager
    Handles needed file streams.
    Sound
    Main sound manager Interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseObject
    The main base class to create objects and its movement for any game.
    Game
    Base game loop (Runnable Thread) with specified delay and period of the thread.
    GameBackground
    Sets background images in gameplay.
    Handler
    A singleton class which holds game objects, animates and renders them.
    Helper
    Helper class which holds main variables need to set game components.
    Leaderboards
    Holds scores of previous played games.
    LoadingScreen
    Atari core loading screen
    Score
    Holds and sorts score to be shown on leaderboards.
    SelectPlayer
    Responsible to fill and select player profile.
    Settings
    Default Settings menu
    Splash
    Main atari Core splash window.
